subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A French inquiry into sports doping uncovered proof that the 1998 Tour de France champion, Marco Pantani, and the runner-up, Jan Ullrich, used the banned blood-booster EPO.
snippet: A French inquiry into sports doping uncovered proof that the 1998 Tour de France champion, Marco Pantani, and the runner-up, Jan Ullrich, used the banned blood-booster EPO.
